name: SSKI
indications:
SSKI
 
  Â®(potassium iodide oral solution, USP) is for use as an expectorant in the symptomatic treatment of chronic pulmonary diseases where tenacious mucus complicates the problem, including bronchial asthma, bronchitis and pulmonary emphysema.
warningsAndPrecautions:
NDC 17856-0114-01 (potassium iodide oral solution, USP) is supplied in 0.1G/0.1mL  120 Syringes
                  Inactive ingredient: Sodium thiosulfate as a preservative.
adverseReactions: Contraindicated in patients with a known sensitivity to iodides.
